title: Breathtaking City and Bay View Remodeled 2bd w/ HW and More ~ J.Wavro
posting_body: San Francisco - Twin Peaks - Apartment for rent
Breathtaking City and Bay View Remodeled 2bd w/ HW and More
Looking for a new home with amazing City and Bay Bridge views?
You will love sitting in your living room with the fireplace going gazing out to the City lights of San Francisco.
Or lounge on your own private balcony watching the sun rise over the Bay.
Good Transit score - the 37 Corbett is right out your front door as well as conveniently located to a number of other public transportation lines.
This remodeled apartment features the following:
~  Remodeled kitchen with stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher
~  Open floor plan living and dining room combo with wood burning fireplace and access to your own private balcony/deck
~  Master bedroom with large walk-in closet plus additional closet and en-suite remodeled bathroom
~  Second bedroom with great closet space
~  Remodeled second bathroom with pedestal sink and shower/tub combo
~  Additional closet space includes a linen and coat closet in the hallway
~  Storage locker included in the rent
~  Water and garbage paid by owner, tenant responsible for PG&E as well as cable and internet
Service or support animals which are necessary due to disability will be allowed.
Burnett Avenue & Parkridge Drive, San Francisco, California

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
